sentences.sContent: He took advantage of me when I was at my most vulnerable.
sentences.sCn: 他在我最脆弱的时候利用了我。

sentences.sContent: We work mainly with the elderly and other vulnerable groups.
sentences.sCn: 我们主要和老年人以及其他弱势群体打交道。

synos.tran: 易受攻击的，易受…的攻击；易受伤害的；有弱点的

trans.tranOther: someone who is vulnerable can be easily harmed or hurt
